subject: Relationships
title: Impact on Children Who Witness Toxicity
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on Impact on Children Who Witness Toxicity.

hook.text: The child never got hit. But she watched her mother get destroyed daily. Children absorb what they witness.

buildup.text: Children who witness toxic relationships develop anxiety, depression, and behavioral problems at 3x the normal rate.

discovery.text: They learn relationship templates early. Boys who watch abuse are 10x more likely to become abusers themselves.

twist.text: 'Staying for the kids' often damages children more than leaving. Kids model what they see, not what they're told.

climax.text: The best thing a parent in a toxic relationship can do for their children is show them what leaving looks like.

punchline.text: Children don't need two parents together. They need healthy love modeled.

quiz.question: How much more likely are children who witness toxicity to develop problems?
